  • Method Details

    • cookie

      Directive<scala.Tuple1<HttpCookiePair>> cookie(String name)
      Extracts the HttpCookiePair with the given name. If the cookie is not present the request is rejected with a respective MissingCookieRejection.

      Parameters:
      name - (undocumented)
      Returns:
      (undocumented)

    • optionalCookie

      Directive<scala.Tuple1<scala.Option<HttpCookiePair>>> optionalCookie(String name)
      Extracts the HttpCookiePair with the given name as an Option[HttpCookiePair]. If the cookie is not present a value of None is extracted.

      Parameters:
      name - (undocumented)
      Returns:
      (undocumented)

    • findCookie

      scala.Function1<HttpHeader,scala.Option<HttpCookiePair>> findCookie(String name)
